Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class UnionDataSet< T >

DataSet specialization to put or get patterns from a union of DataSets.

This object allows several number of DataSets (which has exactly the same patternSize) to be treated as an unique DataSet. The numPatterns is the addition of the numPatterns of each individual DataSet.
